RACE.RACE_TEXT: FAIR GROUNDS RACE 1 6F Dirt CR: 76. Claiming Purse 15000. FOR FILLIES AND MARES FOUR YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON FOUR RACES OR WHICH HAVE NOT WON TWO RACES SINCE JULY 22, 2022. Weight, 124 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since December 22 Allowed 3 lbs. Claiming Price $5,000 (Races Where Entered For $4 ,000 Or Less Not Considered In Eligibility).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: SISTER RULER broke a touch inwardly, stalked outside of the pace setter, chased before bidding at the furlong grounds, then drove clear in the final sixteenth. PRINCESS STELLA (IRE) set the pace along the inside, maintained a margin from an outer chaser through upper stretch, but was collared at the furlong grounds, gave way entering the final sixteenth, and lasted for place. MARY JACK laid off of the pace in the two path, saved ground turning for home, shifted to the four path in upper stretch, and stayed on well in the final furlong, but ran out of ground to reach place. SUFFRAGETTE trailed along the inside, and never got involved. QUEEN'S MISSION tracked outside of the top pair, but gave way in the four to five paths around the turn.

ENTRY.NAME: Sister Ruler
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke bit in, stalked 2wd, bid 1/8, drove clear 1/16

ENTRY.NAME: Princess Stella (IRE)
ENTRY.COMMENT: set pace ins,held sway upper,met bid 1/8,bested 1/16,lasted place

ENTRY.NAME: Mary Jack
ENTRY.COMMENT: off pace 2p-ins, 4p upr, stayed on, missed place

ENTRY.NAME: Queen's Mission
ENTRY.COMMENT: tracked 3wd, gave way 4-5p turn

ENTRY.NAME: Suffragette
ENTRY.COMMENT: trailed ins, never involved

RACE.RACE_TEXT: FAIR GROUNDS RACE 2 1M Dirt CR: 59. Claiming Purse 15000. FOR ACCREDITED LA BRED THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Three Year Olds, 117 lbs.; Older, 125 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race At A Mile Or Over Since December 22 Allowed 3 lbs. Claiming Price $5,000.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: JUJU NINETEEN laid off of the pace three to four wide, gained while fanning five wide entering the lane, sustained a bid coming to midstretch, and edged clear. DEMON HUNTER tracked two to three wide, bid turning for home, floated four wide and between horses entering the lane, vied among foes through midstretch, but was outkicked by an outer rival in the final furlong. SNEAKY ALLIE KAT trailed along the inside, cut the gap around the far turn, tipped two, then three, wide and between horses entering the lane, but only produced a mild kick. HALF A DOODLE stalked along the inside, bid outside of the leader around the far turn, led nearing the lane, but met a trio of outer bids in upper stretch, and gave way in the final furlong. BLUE RIDGE RED ran off and opened up around the first turn, but was headed by a pair of bidders at the five sixteenths pole, and weakened entering the lane.

ENTRY.NAME: Sneaky Allie Kat
ENTRY.COMMENT: trailed ins, cut gap 2nd, 2-3wd btw3/16, mild kick

ENTRY.NAME: Half a Doodle
ENTRY.OWNER: Jones Laurence and Evans Thoroughbred Racing LLC
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked ins, bid 2w5/16, led, ins trio upr, gave way 1/8

ENTRY.NAME: Blue Ridge Red
ENTRY.COMMENT: ran off, opened up, ins pair 5/16, wknd 3/16

ENTRY.NAME: Demon Hunter
ENTRY.COMMENT: tracked 2-3wd, bid 5/16, 4wd btw 3/16, vied, outkicked

ENTRY.NAME: Juju Nineteen
ENTRY.COMMENT: off pace 3-4wd, gained 5w3/16, bid upr, edged clear

RACE.RACE_TEXT: FAIR GROUNDS RACE 3 1M 70Y Dirt CR: 75. Claiming Purse 15000. FOR FOUR YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON THREE RACES. Weight, 124 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race At A Mile Or Over Since December 22 Allowed 3 lbs. Claiming Price $5,000 (Louisiana Bred NW2 $5000 & NW3 $5000 Not Considered In Eligibility).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: BLURT vied three to two wide around the first turn, drew clear with five furlongs to go, relaxed in hand on the front end as foes closed in turning for home, but responded readily and shook away in upper stretch, then held sway under a drive. MAX PANDOWDY tracked from midpack along the inside, moved forward to gain place from outer rivals with a half mile to go, stalked behind the leader around the far turn, then failed to keep pace with that one in upper stretch, battled for place through the final furlong, and held. MINISTRY OF ART bobbled at the start, stalked two to three wide, pursued two wide and between horses turning for home, dueled for place with an inner foe through the final furlong, but was denied. DA GOLD ROOM laid off of the pace in the three path, gained four wide into the far turn to be within striking range turning for home, but hung on his left lead while flattening out in upper stretch, and weakened. ANICLUDE lacked speed in the two to five paths, and failed to factor. OKUDAH vied along the inside of the eventual winner early on, backed off to stalk two wide down the backstretch, but weakened between horses at the three furlong pole, pulled up in the final furlong, and walked off.

ENTRY.NAME: Okudah
ENTRY.COMMENT: vied ins, stalked 5/8, 2w1/2, wknd btw 3/8, pulled up, walked off

ENTRY.NAME: Ministry of Art
ENTRY.COMMENT: bobbled start, stalked 2-3wd, 2wd btw 2nd, place duel, denied

ENTRY.NAME: Max Pandowdy
ENTRY.COMMENT: midpack ins, moved up 1/2, stalked 2nd, place duel, held

ENTRY.NAME: Aniclude
ENTRY.COMMENT: off pace 2p, 5p2nd, no factor

ENTRY.NAME: Blurt
ENTRY.COMMENT: vied 3-2w1st, cleared 5/8, in hand 2nd, responded upr, held sway

ENTRY.NAME: Da Gold Room
ENTRY.COMMENT: off pace 3p,gained 4w2nd,in range 1/4,flattend upr,left ld,wknd

RACE.RACE_TEXT: FAIR GROUNDS RACE 4 6F Dirt CR: 65. Claiming Purse 15000. FOR ACCREDITED LA BRED FOUR YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Weight, 124 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since December 22 Allowed 3 lbs. Claiming Price $5,000.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: HEARTTHROB HALO snagged the outer part of the gate while breaking slow, recovered early on to track along the inside, shifted outside of the top trio in upper stretch, ranged up outside of the leader at the furlong grounds, led entering the final sixteenth, and edged away. OURQUICKDRAWMCGRAW prompted the pace three wide, led entering the lane, cleared before an outer rival menaced in midstretch, and was worn down a sixteenth from home. WAR TROLLEY took a bump from an inner rival at the start, lagged behind in the two path into the turn, cut the gap in the five path entering the lane, dove inwardly while picking up stride rallied in the two to three paths in midstretch, and offered a belated charge. EDDIE'S HUMOR bobbled a bit outwardly and bumped a rival at the start, lacked speed in the four path, came into the lane in the six path, and moved up. REVERENT dueled for the lead two wide and between horses, and gave way while creating tight quarters for his inner counterpart in upper stretch. CHIEFWEAVE dueled for the lead inside of a pair of rivals, but yielded in upper stretch before being put to tight rail quarters leaving the three sixteenths pole. K T'S JILTED GROOM lacked speed in the two path, and made little impact. MAGNOLIA RIDGE pursued from midpack in the four path, but weakened through the final furlong. REVERENT WAS DISQUALIFED AND PLACED SIXTH FOR INTERFERING CHIEFWEAVE IN UPPER STRETCH.

ENTRY.NAME: Chiefweave
ENTRY.COMMENT: dueled inside pair, yielded upper, in tight 3/16

ENTRY.NAME: dq-Reverent
ENTRY.COMMENT: dueled 2wd btwn, gave way upper

ENTRY.NAME: K T's Jilted Groom
ENTRY.COMMENT: off pace 2p, no impact

ENTRY.NAME: Heartthrob Halo
ENTRY.COMMENT: bumpd gate/slow st,tracked ins,4wd upr,bid 1/8,up1/16,edged clear

ENTRY.NAME: Eddie's Humor
ENTRY.OWNER: Cash is King LLC and LC Racing LLC
ENTRY.COMMENT: bobbled bit out/bump st,off pace 4p,6p1/4,moved up

ENTRY.NAME: War Trolley
ENTRY.COMMENT: bumped start,lagged behind 2p,rally 5-2p upr,3p1/8,belated

ENTRY.NAME: Ourquickdrawmcgraw
ENTRY.OWNER: Salome Robert Joseph and Salome Dana
ENTRY.COMMENT: prompt 3wd, led 1/4, cleared, dug in 1/8, worn down 1/16

ENTRY.NAME: Magnolia Ridge
ENTRY.COMMENT: midpack 3wd, 4p turn, wknd 1/8

RACE.RACE_TEXT: FAIR GROUNDS RACE 5 1 1/16M Turf CR: 80. Allowance Optional Claiming Purse 51000. FOR FILLIES THREE YEARS OLD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES OR CLAIMING PRICE $80,000. Weight, 122 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race At A Mile Or Over On The Turf Since January 22 Allowed 3 lbs. Claiming Price $80,000 (Races Where Entered For $50,000 Or Less Not Considered In Allowances) (Preference To Horses That Have Not Started For Less Than $50,000 In Their Last 3 Starts). (If deemed inadvisable by management to run this race over the turf course, it will be run on the main track at One Mile and One Sixteent h.) (Rail at 34 feet).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: HANG THE MOON laid off of the pace in the four to six paths, swung to the eleven path at the three sixteenths pole, rallied in the outer part of the track to drive pat the leaders at the furlong grounds, and kicked clear. BEYOND DOUBT tracked in the five path and between horses, tipped outside of a bidding foe and to the eight path turning for home, bid in the nine path leaving the quarter pole, led in upper stretch, but was outkicked by an outer rival passing the furlong pole. TITLED LADY stalked her entry-mate from the six path, bid outside of that one and from the seven path turning for home, vied as an outer rival bid alongside at the quarter pole, but leaned inwardly while hanging on her left lead between horses in upper stretch, and failed to match strides with a pair of outer rivals at the furlong grounds. VARMLANDER set the pace in the five path, resisted her outer entry-mate's challenge turning for home, but gave way to wider foes in midstretch. PASTA SALAD RHONDA stalked in the four path and between horses, then from the five path around the far turn, but lacked a bid inside of the leader in upper stretch, and failed to menace. DESSERT FIRST tracked inside of rivals while in the three to four paths around the turn, then chased entering the lane before yielding.

ENTRY.NAME: Varmlander
ENTRY.OWNER: Kirk Kat and Sanders Wayne R
ENTRY.COMMENT: set pace 5p, dug in 5/16, gave way 1/8

ENTRY.NAME: Titled Lady
ENTRY.OWNER: Kirk Kat and Sanders Wayne R
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked 6p,bid 7p5/16,vied left lead btw upr,leand in,outkckd 1/8

ENTRY.NAME: Dessert First
ENTRY.COMMENT: tracked ins-3p, 4p2nd, chased, yielded

ENTRY.NAME: Pasta Salad Rhonda
ENTRY.OWNER: Mentz, John and Robertson, Hugh H.
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked 2wd-4p btwn, 5p2nd, lacked split upr, no bid

ENTRY.NAME: Beyond Doubt
ENTRY.COMMENT: tracked 3w-5pbtw, tipped 8p5/16, bid 9p upr, led, outkicked 1/8

ENTRY.NAME: Hang the Moon
ENTRY.COMMENT: off pace 4p, 6p2nd, 11p3/16, rallied, drove past 1/8, cleared

RACE.RACE_TEXT: FAIR GROUNDS RACE 6 1M Dirt CR: 84. Allowance Optional Claiming Purse 52000. FOR ACCREDITED LA BRED FILLIES AND MARES FOUR YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES OTHER THAN MAIDEN, CLAIMING, WAIVER CLAIMING OR STARTER OR WHICH HAVE NEVER WON THREE RACES OR CLAIMING PRICE $20,000. Weight, 124 lbs. Non-winners Of Two R aces At A Mile Or Over Since November 22 Allowed 2 lbs. Such A Race Since Then Allowed 4 lbs. Claiming Price $20,000 Allowance Horses Preferred.

CLAIM.OWNER: Hernandez Earl J Hernandez Keith J and Duvieilh John

RACE.FOOTNOTES: VALE MALE laid off of the pace in the four path, gained into the far turn, sustained a bid in upper stretch, and drove clear late. VISIONOFWILDTIMES vied for the lead along the inside of a rival, dug in to resist a different foe's bid nearing the furlong grounds, proved no match in the final sixteenth, and lasted for place. SPELLBINDING laid off of the pace along the inside, inched closer four to five wide around the far turn, and stayed on evenly. ALLIACEOUS was pinched by between horses at the start, trailed around both turns, shifted outside of rivals in midstretch, and moved up. MISS KENNEDY was bumped by an inner rival into an outer foe at the start, tracked two to three wide, then lacked a four wide bid between horses through the lane. SPECIAL CONNECTION took a mild bump from an inner rival soon after the start, vied two wide, but weakened between horses entering the lane. SKY HIGH SUSAN broke out and bumped a rival a the start, stalked along the inside, and gave way.

ENTRY.NAME: Spellbinding
ENTRY.COMMENT: off pace ins, 4-5w2nd, stayed on evenly

ENTRY.NAME: Visionofwildtimes
ENTRY.COMMENT: vied inside, dug in 1/8, no match, lasted place

ENTRY.NAME: Sky High Susan
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke out/bumped rivals start, stalked ins-2p, gave way

ENTRY.NAME: Alliaceous
ENTRY.COMMENT: pinched start, trailed, 6w1/8, moved up

ENTRY.NAME: Miss Kennedy
ENTRY.COMMENT: bumped btwn start, tracked 2-3wd, 4wd upr, no bid

ENTRY.NAME: Special Connection
ENTRY.COMMENT: bumped start, vied 2wd, wknd btwn 3/16

ENTRY.NAME: Vale Male
ENTRY.COMMENT: off pace 4p, gained 2nd, bid upper, cleared late

RACE.RACE_TEXT: FAIR GROUNDS RACE 7 1M Turf CR: 83. Maiden Special Weight Purse 50000. FOR MAIDENS, THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD. Three Year Olds, 117 lbs.; Older, 125 lbs. (Preference To Horses That Have Not Started For Less Than $50,000 In Their Last 3 Starts). (If deemed inadvisable by management to run this race over the turf course, it will be run on the main track at One Mile and 70 Yards.) (Rail at 34 feet).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: MAASAI WARRIOR vied inside of a keen rival while in the five path, and drew off under driving pressure. CAROOM trailed in the six path, gained show into the far turn, and sustained a rally to gain place at the sixteenth pole. MONJID stalked in the seven path, and stayed on. MO TIME AT ALL got bumped by an inner rival causing him to get rank at the start, shifted out soon after, but ran off into the first turn, led in the six path around that bend, continued to pull while vying with an inner rival around the far turn and weakened in upper stretch. BIG COMMERCE broke out and bumped a rival at the start, lacked speed in the six path, and failed to factor. RUMBLE READY laid off of the pace inside of rivals and in the five path, and made little impact. MEANT TO BE LUCKY steadied between horses entering the first turn, tracked from the seven path, and gave way. MASK PATROL lacked speed while hung in the eight to nine paths around the turn, and was outrun.

ENTRY.NAME: Rumble Ready
ENTRY.OWNER: Low, Lawana L. and Robert E.
ENTRY.COMMENT: off pace ins-5p, no impact

ENTRY.NAME: Caroom
ENTRY.OWNER: Cochonour Don Cochonour Joseph and Caroom Jerry
ENTRY.COMMENT: trailed 6p, gained show 7/16, rallied, up place 1/16

ENTRY.NAME: Maasai Warrior
ENTRY.COMMENT: vied ins-5p, drew off upper, driving

ENTRY.NAME: Big Commerce
ENTRY.COMMENT: bump start, off pace 6p, no factor

ENTRY.NAME: Mo Time At All
ENTRY.COMMENT: bumpd/rank st,shift out,ran off, led 6p1st,pulled,wknd upper

ENTRY.NAME: Mask Patrol
ENTRY.COMMENT: off pace 8p1st, 8p2nd, outrun

ENTRY.NAME: Monjid
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked 7p, stayed on

ENTRY.NAME: Meant to Be Lucky
ENTRY.COMMENT: steadied btwn into 1st, tracked 7p, gave way

RACE.RACE_TEXT: FAIR GROUNDS RACE 8 1M Dirt CR: 65. Maiden Special Weight Purse 50000. FOR ACCREDITED LA BRED MAIDENS, THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD. Three Year Olds, 117 lbs.; Older, 125 lbs. (Preference To Horses That Have Not Started For Less Than $25,000 In Their Last 3 Starts).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: BIG BOO vied three wide, drew clear into the far turn, and was driven home. DOUBLE ON THE RED trailed, gained four wide around the far turn, and sustained his charge to reach place in the final furlong. OUR HEATSEEKER vied for the lead two wide and between horses, but failed to keep pace with his outer counterpart into the far turn, and faded. RUN ON ACES lacked speed along the inside, gave way down the backstretch, yet regained stride while shifting five wide in upper stretch, and moved up. PRINCE PERFECTA chased two to three wide, and lacked a bid. SEA OF LIGHT vied for the lead inside of a pair of foes, but failed to keep pace after a half mile, and weakened.

ENTRY.NAME: Run On Aces
ENTRY.COMMENT: off pace ins, gave way 1/2, 5wd upper, moved up

ENTRY.NAME: Prince Perfecta
ENTRY.COMMENT: off pace 2wd, chased 3w2nd, no bid

ENTRY.NAME: Sea of Light
ENTRY.COMMENT: vied inside pair, outpaced 1/2, wknd

ENTRY.NAME: Our Heatseeker
ENTRY.OWNER: Hernandez Earl J Hernandez Keith J and Duvieilh John
ENTRY.COMMENT: vied 2wd btwn, outpaced 3/8, faded

ENTRY.NAME: Double On the Red
ENTRY.COMMENT: trailed, gained 4w2nd, up place 1/16

ENTRY.NAME: Big Boo
ENTRY.COMMENT: vied 3wd, drew clear 3/8, driving
